parts.text: {"word":"romperse","priority":"N/A","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(スペイン語) 壊す、破る、割る、中断する、違反する","english_definition":"(Spanish) to break, tear, shatter, interrupt, violate","examples":[{"sentence":"No rompas el jarrón.","translation":"花瓶を壊さないで。","english_translation":"Don't break the vase."},{"sentence":"Rompió el silencio.","translation":"彼は沈黙を破った。","english_translation":"He broke the silence."},{"sentence":"Romper las reglas.","translation":"規則を破る。","english_translation":"To break the rules."}],"collocations":["romper el silencio (沈黙を破る)","romper las reglas (規則を破る)","romper un vaso (グラスを割る)","romper el corazón (心を傷つける)"],"synonyms":["quebrar","destrozar","violar","interrumpir"],"antonyms":["reparar","arreglar","cumplir"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb (reflexive)","definition":"(スペイン語 reflexive) 壊れる、破れる、割れる、中断される、(関係が)終わる","english_definition":"(Spanish reflexive) to break, tear, shatter, be interrupted, (relationship) to end","examples":[{"sentence":"El vaso se rompió.","translation":"グラスが割れた。","english_translation":"The glass broke."},{"sentence":"La relación se rompió.","translation":"関係が終わった。","english_translation":"The relationship ended."}],"collocations":["se rompe (壊れる)","se rompió (壊れた)"],"synonyms":["quebrarse","destrozarse","terminar"],"antonyms":["mantenerse","continuar"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の「rumpere」に由来する。","priority":"N/A"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/romˈpeɾse/","syllables":"rom-per-se"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["rompo","rompes","rompe","rompemos","rompéis","rompen"],"past_simple":"rompí","rompiste","rompió","rompimos","rompisteis","rompieron","future_simple":"romperé","romperás","romperá","romperemos","romperéis","romperán","present_subjunctive":"rompa","rompas","rompa","rompamos","rompáis","rompan","past_participle":"roto"},"reflexive_forms":{"present_simple":["me rompo","te rompes","se rompe","nos rompemos","os rompéis","se rompen"],"past_simple":["me rompí","te rompiste","se rompió","nos rompimos","os rompisteis","se rompieron"]}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「Romper」はスペイン語で非常に一般的な動詞で、英語の「break」に相当します。物理的なものを壊すことから、抽象的な概念（規則、沈黙、関係など）を破るまで、幅広い意味で使用されます。再帰動詞「romperse」は、何かが自然に壊れる場合や、関係が終わる場合に使用されます。","priority":"N/A"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Yo rompo la regla.","correct":"Yo rompo la regla.","note":"(正しい文です。)"}],"priority":"N/A"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["rotura (名詞: 破損、亀裂)","rompimiento (名詞: 破壊、決裂)","rompedor (形容詞: 革新的な、破壊的な)"],"phrasal_verbs":["romper con (～と別れる)","romper a llorar (泣き出す)"]},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B1","frequency_google_ngram":"N/A","priority":"N/A"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"「Romper」は、スペイン語で「壊す」という意味の基本的な動詞です。物理的なものだけでなく、ルールや約束を「破る」という意味でも使われます。再帰動詞「romperse」は、何かが自然に「壊れる」ときに使います。例えば、「El vaso se rompió」（グラスが割れた）のように使います。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Voy a romper el papel.","translation":"紙を破ります。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"壊す"},{"sentence":"Se rompió la pierna jugando al fútbol.","translation":"彼はサッカーをしていて足を骨折した。","type":"verb (reflexive)","meaning_category":"壊れる"},{"sentence":"No debes romper las promesas.","translation":"約束を破ってはいけません。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"破る"},{"sentence":"Tenemos que romper el hielo.","translation":"打ち解けなければならない。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"(比喩的に) 打ち破る"}]}
